wikipedia_page.main: Drewonde Bascome (born 17 November 1992) is Bermudan footballer who currently plays for Robin Hood FC and the Bermuda national football team as a midfielder.

response: * Andrew Bascome, David Bascome (brother), Drewonde Bascome (nephew), Osagi Bascome (nephew)

| Drewonde BascomeOliver Jalen HarveyWendell MingLejaun SimmonsKeishen BeanDaniel JohnsonJohn NusumRai SimonsTyrell BurgessRoger LeeCecoy RobinsonShakir SmithDomico CoddingtonZeko LewisAntwan RussellMarco WarrenFredrick HallDamon MingAngelo SimmonsDominique Williams
His cousin Drewonde Bascome is a professional footballer who also plays for Bermuda. The brothers are nephews of Bermudan coach Andrew Bascome, and great-nephews of government minister Lovitta Foggo.

Ming then moved to the Thomas College, having received a scholarship from the Maine-based school, and helped the team win the 2013 North Atlantic Conference Championship in his first year. He spent the summer of 2014 with the IMG Academy in Bradenton, Florida, and played in the Premier Development League alongside fellow Bermudians Casey Castle, Drewonde Bascome and Jaylen Harvey.
